recommendations.title: The Best (and Worst) Countries for Nature Conservation, Ranked
recommendations.excerpt: If you’re an environmentally-minded traveller (as we all should be) knowing as much as possible about how hard our destination of choice is working to do its part in saving the planet can only be a good thing.

recommendations.title: Hindi Cinema Used to Operate in an Alternative Reality: Shabana Azmi
recommendations.excerpt: Indian veteran actress Shabana Azmi has recently captivated the audience during a masterclass moderated by actress Vidya Balan at the 2024 MAMI Mumbai Film Festival. The two icons shared insights on their journeys, the challenges of acting across different mediums, and their thoughts on the evolution of Hindi cinema.

recommendations.title: India’s Start-Ups Look to Villages to Drive Next Leg of Growth
recommendations.excerpt: The tiny villages of Haryana state in India’s rural north-west find themselves in an unlikely spotlight these days. Farmers' homes in hamlets around the industrial town of Rohtak are suddenly in demand, doubling up as movie sets.

recommendations.title: Neurologist Says Waking up to Alarms Can Cause ‘significant Upsurge’ in Blood Pressure; Know More
recommendations.excerpt: Alarms are saviours that help many of us wake up in the morning. But can this routine habit lead to increased blood pressure? When consultant neurologist Dr Sudhir Kumar, Apollo Hospitals, Hyderabad highlighted the same, we decided to take some notes.

recommendations.title: Canadian Climate Lawsuit by Young People Could Sway Global Cases
recommendations.excerpt: The appeals court in Canada's most populous province is set to rule on Thursday whether Ontario's climate target violates young people's rights, in a decision that could sway similar cases internationally.

recommendations.title: Gaming Addiction on the Rise in India
recommendations.excerpt: Estimates put forward by different studies and research papers have indicated that in India, anywhere between 1.3 per cent and 19.9 per cent of adolescents are suffering from gaming addiction.

recommendations.title: How to Plan Your Finances for Dhanteras?
recommendations.excerpt: As Dhanteras approaches, marking the beginning of the Diwali festival, people are gearing up for new purchases and investments. However, it is crucial to approach this celebration with a well-thought-out financial strategy.

recommendations.title: CWG 2026: How India’s Medal Hopes Are Affected by Exclusion of Six Key Sports
recommendations.excerpt: The Glasgow edition of the CWG has reduced the number of sports to just 10, part of a cost-cutting measure.

recommendations.title: India and China Agree to De-Escalate Border Tensions
recommendations.excerpt: India and China have agreed on patrolling arrangements to de-escalate tensions along their disputed Himalayan border, India’s top diplomat has said.

recommendations.title: Do You Train the Same Set of Muscles Every Day? It Can Be Disastrous
recommendations.excerpt: Maybe you are conscious about your thick thighs or eagerly want to get your back into better shape as soon as possible – does that mean you should train them every day in the gym? Nope, you can’t and you shouldn’t.

recommendations.title: How Self-Compassion Can Help You Deal With Stress
recommendations.excerpt: According to new research, self-compassion may help people use more effective coping strategies and in turn feel better.

recommendations.title: 8 Books That Capture the Essence of Indian Art, Design, and Cultural Heritage
recommendations.excerpt: If you’ve always been fascinated by India’s rich heritage and the beauty of its art and design, you’re not alone. From intricate embroidery in traditional clothing to the grand architecture of ancient temples, Indian aesthetics reflect centuries of spirituality, culture, and craftsmanship.

recommendations.title: We Need to Talk About the Emotional Weight of Work
recommendations.excerpt: A time management coach explains that often it’s not the difficulty of a task that leads to procrastination, it’s the emotions connected to the task.

recommendations.title: Is the Future of Commonwealth Games a Stripped Down and Budget-Friendly Version?
recommendations.excerpt: Future of team sports like cricket, hockey and rugby uncertain as Glasgow opts for lesser number of sports, athletes and venues

recommendations.title: Diverse Career Paths Available for Public Policy Graduates in India
recommendations.excerpt: India's higher education landscape, particularly in policy studies, has expanded rapidly in response to the growing complexities of governance and the demand for skilled professionals in public policy and administration.

recommendations.title: AI Art: The End of Creativity or the Start of a New Movement?
recommendations.excerpt: Artificial intelligence is being used to generate paintings, images and even sculptures, with some selling for thousands of dollars. Do we need to reframe our definition of art?

recommendations.title: Is It Time to Amend the Right to Education Act?
recommendations.excerpt: The Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan (SSA) was launched in 2001 to achieve universal elementary education. It aimed at providing free and compulsory education to all

recommendations.title: Things Millennial Parents Wish Their Boomer Parents Understood
recommendations.excerpt: Like many things, parenting too has changed with the generation. Now when the millennial kids have finally become parents, they often wish that their boomer parents understood. The rise in burdens of all sorts, including financial, professional and familial, can be a lot of millennial parents. This is why they are choosing a different style to be parents and are wishing for their boomer parents to understand.

recommendations.title: Breaking the Silence: Addressing Mental Health Stigma Among Older Generations
recommendations.excerpt: Mental health challenges do not discriminate by age, yet older generations often face unique barriers when it comes to addressing these issues. While younger populations have made strides in reducing the stigma surrounding mental health, seniors are often left behind.

recommendations.title: Language Evolves Over Time and Islands Can Drive Linguistic Diversity
recommendations.excerpt: They take up little of Earth’s inhabited land but churn out languages like no continent can.

recommendations.title: Penguin Adds a Do-Not-Scrape-for-AI Page to Its Books
recommendations.excerpt: Taking a firm stance against tech companies’ unlicensed use of its authors’ works, the publishing giant Penguin Random House will change the language on all of its books’ copyright pages to expressly prohibit their use in training artificial intelligence systems, according to reporting by The

recommendations.title: Here’s What Longevity Experts Eat for Breakfast to Add Years to Their Lives
recommendations.excerpt: If you’re going to have the same meal on repeat every morning, how great would it be if it could give you more time on Earth?

recommendations.title: The Tech YouTuber Who Opened a Coffee Shop
recommendations.excerpt: On The Vergecast: one man’s journey from the YouTube grind to the coffee grind.

recommendations.title: How Feminist Approach to Technology Is Transforming the Lives of Women Through Innovation and Tech
recommendations.excerpt: Feminist Approach to Technology is paving the way for women and girls from marginalised communities to thrive in STEM and become leaders in their communities.

recommendations.title: Are Millennial Parents Winning at Parenting? What All Are They Doing Differently?
recommendations.excerpt: Generations each bring their own parenting style, but recent surveys suggest that Millennials may be leading the way. With a focus on mental health, emotional intelligence, and gentle parenting, they are reshaping family dynamics. What sets them apart from previous generations? Find out how Millennial parents are redefining the parenting game in a modern, compassionate way.

recommendations.title: Depression Remaps a Major Brain Network: What a New Study Found
recommendations.excerpt: Depression symptoms may come and go, but a new study has found that the condition changes internal communications in the brain, regardless of whether people feel depressed or not.

recommendations.title: How Hoax Bomb Threats Are Hurting Air Travel in India
recommendations.excerpt: The 211 passengers on the Boeing 777, originally en route from Mumbai to Chicago, had been diverted early on 15 October due to a bomb threat.

recommendations.title: How Snake Oil Became a Symbol of Fraud and Deception
recommendations.excerpt: The terms “snake oil” and “snake-oil salesperson” are part of the vernacular thanks to Clark Stanley, a quack doctor who marketed a product for joint pain in the late 19th century.

recommendations.title: How Refrigeration Ruined Fresh Food
recommendations.excerpt: Nearly everything on the American plate is processed, shipped, stored, and sold under refrigeration. In her new book, Nicola Twilley reflects on what it means to be entirely dependent on artificial cooling.

recommendations.title: Why Sexual Wellness Is the New Travel Trend We Need to Talk About
recommendations.excerpt: The growing trend for exploring our intimate needs and desires is long overdue. This is why adding sex to your next travel itinerary shouldn’t be taboo
